comments.body: Hello! label created for days on ORD-2025-2050. Did it actually ship? 😅
Hello Liam — happy to help. Sorry about the trouble. I filed a trace with the carrier for ORD-2025-2050. If not found in 48h, we'll reship or refund—your choice. I'm here if you need more help.
That works for me. 🙏
